meanings.definition: Capable of being clearly identified or defined.
meanings.sent1: The specifiable characteristics of the animal made it easy to recognize.
meanings.sent2: The specifiable details in the contract helped avoid any confusion.
meanings.sent3: It was a specifiable situation when the lost keys magically reappeared.
meanings.sent4: Her laughter was as specifiable as a bright, sunny day.
meanings.sent5: The teacher's instructions were so specifiable that even the youngest students understood.

meanings.definition: Able to be specified or described.
meanings.sent1: The specifiable ingredients in the recipe made it easy to follow.
meanings.sent2: The specifiable features of the car were listed in the brochure.
meanings.sent3: It was a specifiable moment when the shy cat suddenly started dancing.
meanings.sent4: His smile was as specifiable as a rainbow after the rain.
meanings.sent5: The map provided specifiable directions to the hidden treasure.
